title: Camera Corner Los Angeles Premiere – November 7th – at Braindead Studios!
content:
Every screening of Camera Corner has sold out quicker than people realize, so if you want to catch the film, buy your tickets now!

We are stoked to announce the Camera Corner premiere in Los Angeles on November 7th at Braindead Studios. The screening starts at 8 PM sharp, so get there on time. Buy your tickets at Braindead Studios now, because as noted above, this will sell out.

The post Camera Corner Los Angeles Premiere – November 7th – at Braindead Studios! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
